query.sql: select period_id, period_code, period_name, status, priority from gl_period t where t.book_set_id = ${@book_set_id} #AND_CLAUSE# order by t.priority

query.name: combo
query.sql: select period_id, period_code, period_name, status, priority from gl_period t where status='Y' and t.book_set_id = ${@book_set_id} order by t.priority

query.name: comboAll
query.sql: select period_id, period_code, period_name, status, priority from gl_period t where status != 'A' and t.book_set_id = ${@book_set_id} order by t.priority
